title: 3 and Out -  Draft Grade Hate, Georgia Draft Dominance, Ratings Dip
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  Draft Grade Hate, Georgia Draft Dominance, Ratings Dip
description:
John wraps up the NFL Draft weekend by explaining why he hates draft grades and looks at Georgia’s draft class dominance, why the ratings dipped, if more teams should involve players in the draft process like the Eagles with Jason Kelce.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
